node.title: Man threatened 92yo woman with pruning shears before sexually assaulting and robbing her
node.alt: A man in a striped shirt and shorts sits on the kerb as two detectives, with faces blurred, stand nearby
node.description: A Sydney man who has admitted to sexually assaulting a 92-year-old woman after breaking into her Concord home says he was in a drunken stupor at the time of the attack and is "sickened" by the crimes.
node.content: ["A 92-year-old woman was threatened with pruning shears, sexually assaulted and doused in cooking oil during a home invasion by a man who claims he was \"blacked out\" drunk, a Sydney court has been told.", "WARNING: This story contains graphic content that may upset some readers.", "Craig Anthony Wheatman broke into the victim's home at Concord, in the city's inner-west, in the early hours of January 23 this year.", "The 29-year-old has admitted to charges including aggravated sexual assault, aggravated break and enter, sexually touching a person without consent and two counts of common assault.", "During a sentencing hearing today in\u00a0the NSW District Court, a statement of agreed facts were read. This\u00a0provided details of the elderly woman's ordeal, most of which is\u00a0too graphic to publish.", "She was slapped and threatened with the shears before the sexual assault, then Wheatman forced her into the shower and poured oil, vinegar and Dettol over her in an apparent attempt to cover up his crime.", "He stole her wallet and two sets of keys before the victim's son and police arrived when a medical alarm pendant sent out a call for help.", "After his arrest, Wheatman claimed to not remember what happened in the house due to his \"drunk stupor\", but told officers he had a \"gut feeling\" he'd done something \"horrid\".", "He later recalled during\u00a0a police interview that he wanted to leave the property because \"whatever ordeal had happened, she deserved for it to be over\", according to the agreed facts.", "Wheatman, who showed no reaction on a video link from prison as the details were aired, told police he heard voices in his head.", "\"There is no way in hell I would do something like that,\" Wheatman said of the sexual assault allegations.", "He said he has \"bashed\" by fellow inmates in jail for doing similar things.", "\"There is no way in hell, no way \u2026\u00a0I'm sickened by this.\u00a0I hope it wasn't me.\"", "He also recalled seeing the woman's injuries, including a split to her cheek.", "\"Is she all right?\" he asked.", "\"I worry that someone of that age is not going to be OK.\"", "The 92-year-old was released from hospital a few days after the attack and police at the time said she was \"strong willed\" and \"positive\" about her recovery.", "While Wheatman didn't give evidence, his Legal Aid lawyer signalled he had voiced a \"desire to constructively engage\" in a range of therapeutic programs.", "The court was told Wheatman\u00a0had been squatting for approximately two months, experienced a psychotic episode in the months before the attack and, while he had been on medication, he hadn't taken it for about a week.", "He experienced \"displacement\" in his teenage years and a feeling of \"abandonment\", Judge Donna Woodburne was told.", "It was accepted that a \"lengthy\" jail sentence was expected."]
